code: import axios from"axios";import{FETCH_PRODUCT,GET_ERROR}from"./constants";export var fetchProduct=function fetchProduct(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/products/allProducts").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(post){return dispatch({type:FETCH_PRODUCT,payload:post});});};};export var createProduct=function createProduct(newProduct,history){return function(dispatch){axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/products/addProduct",newProduct).then(function(res){return history.push("/allProducts");}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERROR,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(itemid){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("http://localhost:3001/api/products/${itemId}").then(function(res){return dispatch({payload:itemid});});};};export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(itemId){return function(dispatch){axios.put("http://localhost:3001/api/products/${itemId}").then(function(res){return dispatch({payload:Promise.all([itemId,res.data])});});};};
